title: Share of economic sectors in the GDP in Ghana 2018
summary: In general Share in GDP has rose over the Year.
Share in GDP is roughly constant from 2009 to 2010, and lastly slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012.
Maximum Share in GDP, about 27.14 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Share in GDP about 18.01 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: In general Share in GDP has rose over the Year.
